sentences.en: "We urged donors to accelerate delivery of commitments to increase aid, and for us all to consider going beyond existing commitments," they said in a communique after a meeting here.
sentences.cn: "我们呼吁援助国加快实现增加援助的承诺,所有国家都应考虑在现有承诺以外扩大援助,"出席官员在华盛顿会议的公报中指出.

sentences.en: A joint communique was issued on May 5.
sentences.cn: 五月五日发表了一项联合公报.

sentences.en: According to the latest communique, both sides will soon reach an agreement.
sentences.cn: 根据最近的一份公报, 双方不久将达成一项协议.

sentences.en: But, said a reporter, the communique specifically suggested just that.
sentences.cn: 一个记者说：「可是公报说的很明确，就是那样。」

sentences.en: By the spring of 1972, the Sino - American Shanghai Communique had been signed.
sentences.cn: 到了1972年春天, 签订了中美上海公报.

sentences.en: He sent me the communique; I looked it through thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 他把公报送来, 我仔细看了一遍.

sentences.en: My colleagues read the communique astonishment rather than excitement.
sentences.cn: 我的同事读了公报,感到惊奇而不是欣喜.

sentences.en: My colleagues read the communique with astonishment rather than jubilation.
sentences.cn: 同事们读了公报,只感惊奇,而非欣喜.

sentences.en: The announcement was made in a communique & 1 & issued by the Defence Minister.
sentences.cn: 这项公告是在国防部长的 公报 中发出的.

sentences.en: The communique , Georges thought with satisfaction, would make a lively item on the evening news.
sentences.cn: 乔戈斯满意地想, 这个宣言会在晚上的新闻节目里成为一条引人注目的新闻.

sentences.en: The communique & 1 & made no mention of progress on any of the issues.
sentences.cn: 公报只字不提这些问题中哪个问题取得了进展.

sentences.en: The communique gave no other details.
sentences.cn: 这份公报并未透露其他细节。

sentences.en: The following communique was therefore framed and agreed to by all.
sentences.cn: 因此,拟定了下列公报,并获得大家一致同意.

sentences.en: The full text of the communique reads as follows.
The minister wrestled over the wording of the communique.
There was no mention of Kelly in Dr. Halsey's communique.
sentences.cn: 哈尔茜博士的公报里没提到凯丽.

sentences.en: We had asked them to delete him from the communique and crop him from the picture.
sentences.cn: 我们要求他们不把他的名字写入公报,并且把他从照片上剪掉.
